name: Unsilent Gun PRO
description:
An adventure waits for an unsung hero. The city swarming with bad guys and the people awaiting justice. It’s the silence before the storm… the silence of the gun.

Get immersed in a thrilling action packed first person shootout game Unsilent Gun. Be the saviour and go on a killing spree to eliminate the enemies and clear the city streets. Shoot, Reload and Bang out the obstacles with an awesome range of kick-ass weapons and controllable vehicles like cars, tanks, helicopters and turrets.

Carry heavy explosives, best-in-class guns and weapons to play through action-packed missions on an endless quest to defeat the arch-nemesis and secure the city. Show off your shooting skills to kill the gunmen and complete the mission.

Can you kill ‘em all?

 Our Action-Packed Features

-- 30+ shoot em up missions.
-- Multiple weapon choices and explosives.
-- A shop with awesome ingame features and IAP like GodMode, Golden Gun and a Jetpack!
-- Leader-board and achievements to compete with your friends to the top.

Your next mission… should you choose to accept!
